name: Blockchain Development Hook
description: Specialized hook for blockchain wallet platform development with autonomous coding and security validation

then.prompt: Activate Blockchain Development Agent using #blockchain-wallet-steering and #autonomous-coding-steering. For Rust blockchain code: 1) Automatically run cargo test and cargo clippy 2) Validate private key security (never server-side) 3) Check for reentrancy and overflow vulnerabilities 4) Ensure proper error handling 5) Auto-fix issues until all tests pass. For Solidity contracts: validate access controls, gas optimization, and security patterns. Operate in full auto-mode within sandbox.
